}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "48DHXA08.0GA" and "2012/07/11" is silkscreened on the board. {{See also|Wistron NeWeb|Unex}} *802.11a/b/g/n 2x2 Mini PCIe (half-size) :Bluetooth 4.0/HS Combo (WB222/AR9462)
===Unex's marketing text=== DHXA-222 is an 802.11n dual-band and Bluetooth 4.0 combo mPCIe which delivers up to 300Mbps Wi-Fi data rate and supports Bluetooth high speed and low energy. Advanced integration delivers superior Wi-Fi and Bluetooth coexistence to ensure the best possible wireless experience at lowest power consumption.
==Links of Interest== :[https://www.unex.com.tw/products/wi-fi/interfaces/pcie-wifi/80211n-bluetooth/detail/dhxa-222 Specifications] {{â€¢}} [https://www.unex.com.tw/download/57834bf3919e8/16?token=GBbxmtTMqozLlmSFYRhFPA0MkoTGxR5ZnGGF7zSu Datasheet]
